rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a welcoming area and built-in storage. Vastu-aligned to promote positive energy.
The main living space combining an open-plan kitchen, dining area, and living room with ample natural light. Vastu principles ensure the entrance faces east.
A two-car garage accommodating vehicles conveniently, with direct access from the studio apartment and designed to maintain structural integrity as per local norms.
An exclusive library area with dedicated shelving, comfortable seating, and a quiet ambiance. Positioned in the north-east corner to promote knowledge and wisdom.
A modern bathroom designed for utility and privacy, ensuring proper ventilation as per Indian building norms.

openings.description: The main entrance is positioned to harness positive energy according to Vastu, inviting light and air.
Strategically placed windows for maximum natural light while ensuring privacy and adherence to local building codes.
A well-engineered garage door providing easy access and maintaining the design aesthetics.

building_norms.compliance: Indian building regulations and local norms including fire safety, structural integrity, and Vastu guidelines.
building_norms.orientation: The studio apartment is oriented to maximize natural lighting with the entrance facing east.

vastu_considerations.water_systems: Placed in the north-west, ensuring proper drainage and alignment with Vastu principles.
